name: LactateDehydrogenaseBldSerPlas
title: Lactate Dehydrogenase, Bld/Ser/Plas
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to the measurement of lactate dehydrogenase enzymatic activity in blood, serum, or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes lactate dehydrogenase 1 through 5.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
